treeViews.bindSrcParameters: function getParameters(){ var postForm = new FormData(); postForm.append('id', (new URLSearchParams(document.location.search)).get('id')); return postForm}; getParameters();

actions.title: ذخیره
actions.onClick: postPanel(this, '/Account/RoleManagerAccess/Update', 'function getParameters(){ var postForm = { id: (new URLSearchParams(document.location.search)).get(\'id\') };  return postForm}; getParameters();')
